PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-08662022-07-07,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of MONA NEMER, C.M., C.Q., of Ottawa, Ontario, as special adviser to the Minister of Industry, to be known as the Chief Science Advisor, to hold office during good behavior for a term of two years, effective September 25, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of MONA NEMER, C.M., C.Q., of Ottawa, Ontario, as special adviser to the Minister of Industry, to be known as the Chief Science Advisor, to hold office during good behavior for a term of two years, effective September 25, 2022.
